name: Aerodrone
effect: When equipped Creature deals Air damage, you may look at the top four cards of your Attack Deck and put them back on top in any order.

name: Akkrean
effect: 1MC: Deal 10 damage to target Creature on your side of the Battleboard.
Rarely to enemies enter his lands, and almost never do they leave unscathed.

name: Alazdan
effect: 2MC, Sacrifice Alazdan: Deal 35 damage to target engaged Creature.

name: Algal Wings of Attraction
effect: If an adjacent opposing Creature can move into equipped Creature's space, it must do so.
(You may only initiate one combat per turn.)

name: Allegro
effect: If your engaged Creature won Initiative this turn, Allegro's cost is reduced by 2 Mugic counters.
Even with Spectral Viewers, the invasion squad could no longer find the elusive Mipedians.

name: Alluring Bait
effect: Equipped Creature has "Discard a Mugic Card: Relocate target opposing unengaged Creature into an unoccupied space adjacent to equipped Creature."

name: Aokua
effect: Aokua was the first to learn that if you can get past the hardened shell, Danians are both nutritious and delicious.

name: Aria of Enragement
effect: "Be gone, you fool! The Cothica won't save Perim! Look at the devastation even a hint of its power can cause!"

name: Aspect Amplifier: Agility
effect: Equipped Creature has "Outperform Speed 5." (Equipped Creature deals an additional 5 damage with successful Speed attacks.)

name: Aspect Amplifier: Bravery
effect: Equipped Creature has "Outperform Courage 5." (Equipped Creature deals an additional 5 damage with successful Courage attacks.)

name: Aspect Amplifier: Might
effect: Equipped Creature has "Outperform Power 5." (Equipped Creature deals an additional 5 damage with successful Power attacks.)

name: Aspect Amplifier: Wit
effect: Equipped Creature has "Outperform Wisdom 5." (Equipped Creature deals an additional 5 damage with successful Wisdom attacks.)

name: Ballad of the Belittled
effect: Deal 20 damage to target Creature that has no Disciplines greater than 25.
Always pick off the weak before they grow up and pick you off.

name: Bivike
effect: While engaged with a M'arrillian, Bivike has "Invisibility: Strike 20."
While in a space with a Mirage, Bivike's Disciplines can't be raised or lowered.

name: Bladez
effect: If an Attack Card played by Bladez would deal 0 damage, it deals 15 damage instead.

name: Bodal's Arsenal
effect: When this becomes the active Location, each player may return a Battlegear from their discard pile to play equipped to an unequipped Creature that player controls.

name: Brain Amplifier
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Wisdom and 5 Energy.
When equipped Creature wins combat, it gains a Mugic counter.

name: Brawlers' Burrow
effect: When this becomes the active Location, both players shuffle their Attack Decks and Attack Discard piles together.

name: Breath of the Desert
effect: Sacrifice Breath of the Desert: Equipped Creature gains "Air 5." Play this ability only while equipped Creature is engaged.

name: Broken Edge
effect: Damage dealt by Wisdom Attacks is reduced by 5.
Nature wages its own war between the forest and the desert.

name: Burning Rain
effect: If Burning Rain would deal more than 10 damage, it deals 10 damage instead.

name: Cadence Clash
effect: Negate target Mugic and return that card to its owner's hand.
There is nothing worse for a Muge than the stunning sound of silence.

name: Carnivore's Keening
effect: "This is where we draw the line! Protect the Riverlands!"

name: Chamber of Waves
effect: As corrupted water flows through the pipes of the gigantic acoustic organ, a sound resonates that is both eerie, beautiful and inexplicably dangerous.

name: Chromatic Postlude
effect: Deal 5 damage to target Creature for each Mugic counter spent to play Chromatic Postlude.
"What you call 'overkill' is what I call 'being thorough.'"

name: Daunting Bravery
effect: Stat Check Courage 50: Opposing engaged Creature loses 15 Courage.

name: Deadrange Gong
effect: Chieftains have an additional 15 in all Disciplines and "Water 5."
Reverberating throughout the deep, M'arrillians can also receive commands by sensing vibrations in the water.

name: Deceleration
effect: (To win a Stat Fail, the opposing engaged Creature's Discipline must be less than the stated number.)

name: Deep Dirge
effect: Target Creature plays its abilities as if that Creature's controller also controlled a Chieftain.
As his eyes glazed over, all he could think was, "Obey, obey, obey."

name: Desert's Wrathsong
effect: Destroy target Creature with 0 Speed and 0 Power.
Under the burning sun, even the hardiest desiccate in a matter of minutes.

name: Deserter's Finale
effect: Deal 5 damage to target Creature. Deal an additional 10 damage to that Creature if it has Water.
"The fire of the UnderWorld will burn forever!"

name: Destructozooka
effect: When Destructozooka is flipped face-up, choose an Elemental Type. Equipped Creature gains the chosen Elemental Type and "Element 5" of the chosen Elemental Type.

name: Disarming Theme
effect: Each time Tangath tried to pick up his blade his unseen foe knocked it away again.

name: Dissonance of Will
effect: Negate target activated Creature ability. (Activated abilities are ones with a cost.)

name: Domestic Hive Hymn
effect: If Hive is active, that Creature gains an additional 10 Energy.
With my hive family, I am more "we" than "me."

name: Draining Dirge
effect: Though Mandiblors are treated as the dregs of society, Queen Illexia loves all her children equally.

name: Dry Liquid
effect: Stat Check Power 50: Opposing engaged Creature loses 15 Power.

name: Duality Dirge
effect: Target Creature gains or loses Courage, Power, Wisdom and Speed to make its Disciplines equal to its Scanned Disciplines and cannot be the target of Mugic or abilities.

name: Ebena'bakku
effect: While your engaged Creature has more Mugic counters than the opposing engaged Creature, your opponent must play Attack Cards at random.
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Ecstatic Fanfare
effect: Target Creature gains 20 Wisdom, 15 Courage, 10 Speed and 5 Power.
Najarin found it more interesting than prophetic that he had seven letters in his name.

name: Electro-Web
effect: Challenge Power 30: Deal 10 damage. If you lose this Challenge, gain 15 Power.
Challenge Speed 30: Deal 10 damage. If you lose this Challenge, gain 15 Speed.

name: Empowering Serenade
effect: "We all fail, my friend. But how we respond to failure - now that is the sign of a champion."

name: Erak'tabb
effect: Attacks played by Creatures you control have "Challenge Wisdom 50: Deal 10 damage."
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Etude of Exhaustion
effect: As the battle dragged on from days to weeks, the battalion lost the will to keep fighting.

name: Falsetto
effect: Target Creature loses 20 Power, 15 Speed, 10 Courage and 5 Wisdom.

name: Fanfare of the Brain
effect: Target Creature gains 25 Courage and 25 Wisdom. If the target is a Minion, it gains another 25 Courage and 25 Wisdom.

name: Fatiguing Falsetto
effect: "If you have patience, you can win a war without fighting a single battle."

name: Fazkaal
effect: When a Mugic counter is removed from the opposing engaged Creature, that Creature loses 20 to all Disciplines.

name: Final Fugue
effect: With adrenaline pumping through his veins, Ragetrod hardly felt a thing when he rammed headfirst through three stone pillars.

name: Flaming Coals
effect: Flaming Coals may not be the target of Mugic or abilities.

name: Fluidmorpher's Fanfare
effect: Target Creature gains a Mugic counter and "Water 5."
"Defeat the enemy from within. When they no longer know whom to trust, they'll crumble on their own!"

name: Frafdo, The Hero
effect: While you control no other Creatures, Frafdo has an additional 45 Energy.
"Thirty against one? It hardly seems fair... for you."

name: Gambreor
effect: 1MC, Sacrifice a Battlegear: Heal 15 damage to target Creature.

name: Gambreor's Hut
effect: If a Mugic or ability would decrease a Creature's Discipline, that Mugic or ability decreases the Discipline by 10 less instead.

name: Gan'trak
effect: Attacks played by your Creatures reduce the opposing engaged Creature's Disciplines by an amount equal to the damage they would deal instead of dealing damage.
If a Creature has 0 in all Disciplines, destroy it.
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Gloom-mire Night
effect: Creatures cannot be relocated by Mugic or abilities.
As Bodal sank into the murky swamp, he calculated that he had 45.7 seconds until he would be gargling black ooze.

name: Gravity Slam
effect: (To win a Stat Fail, the opposing engaged Creature's Discipline must be less than the stated number.)

name: Hall of Fatigue
effect: When the body has nothing left to give, only the strong-willed fight on.

name: Hermatred
effect: Hive: Hermatred has an additional 5 Energy for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play.
While engaged with an Infected Creature, Hermatred has an additional 15 Energy.

name: Hive Amber
effect: While Hive Amber is in your discard pile, when a Mandiblor you control leaves play, you may return Hive Amber to play equipped to an unequipped Creature you control.

name: Ice Disks
effect: Your opponent may not play activated abilities. (Apply this effect only as this card resolves.)

name: Ice Sheet
effect: Water: Deal an additional 5 damage for each Mugic counter on your engaged Creature.

name: Ihun'kalin
effect: Discard two Mugic Cards: Destroy target engaged Creature with 0 Speed.
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Ijahni Outpost
effect: Mirage: Creatures may not move off this space unless their controller pays a Mugic counter from any Creature they control.

name: Ikkatosh, Guardian of Nature
effect: When a Muge or Elementalist you control wins combat, it gains a Mugic counter.
Having lived for ages, Ikkatosh vaguely remembers the last time the Doors were open. It did not end well.

name: Illusionary Lake
effect: Engaged Creatures do not have Water and cannot gain it.
Mirage: Creatures in this space do not have Water and cannot gain it.

name: Ilx
effect: While engaged with an unequipped Creature, Ilx has an additional "Air 5" and "Recklessness 5."

name: Imaginary Walls
effect: When this becomes the active Location, your opponent may return a Mugic Card in their discard pile to their hand.
Attacks deal 10 less damage to M'arrillian and Minion Creatures.

name: Improvisational Melody
effect: If your engaged Creature dealt 20 or more attack damage this turn, Improvisational Melody's cost is reduced by 2 Mugic counters.

name: Intense Polyphony
effect: If your engaged Creature has taken 15 or more attack damage this turn, Intense Polyphony's cost is reduced by 2 Mugic counters.
Against the Danians, there is no such thing as a one-on-one fight.

name: Jade Pillar
effect: When Jade Pillar becomes the active Location, put 10 Jade counters on it.
Remove a Jade counter from Jade Pillar for every 5 attack damage dealt this turn.
When the last counter is removed, Jade Pillar deals 50 damage to the Creature that played the last attack.

name: Jumbad
effect: 1MC: Target Creature gains 10 Speed and 10 Wisdom.

name: Kalanju
effect: Hive: While Infected, Kalanju has an additional 30 Energy.

name: Katharaz
effect: "Unite and fight! If we lose the Reservoir, the rest of Mount Pillar will fall!"

name: Kha'rall Husk Armor
effect: When equipped Creature is dealt 15 or more attack damage, the next attack equipped Creature plays deals 0 damage.

name: Kileron, Warbeast of the Dust Storm
effect: Creatures and Battlegear Cards that would be placed in a discard pile are removed from the game instead.

name: Klar'nok
effect: Discard a Mugic Card: Target Elemental Attack deals 15 less damage.
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Kreaal
effect: UnderWorld Creatures you control have "Intimidate: Power 20" and "Exhaust all Disciplines 5."
Kreaal cannot be brainwashed because he has no brain to begin with.

name: Lava Pond, Milla'iin's Foothold
effect: When this becomes the active Location, each player reveals a random Mugic Card from their hand.
Cards with the same name as the revealed cards may not be played.
M'arrillian and Minion Creatures take 5 less damage from Mugic, activated abilities, and triggered abilities.

name: Lendai
effect: While Lendai is Infected, it may not be the target of Mugic or abilities.

name: Lyssta
effect: When Lyssta wins Initiative, it gains "Outperform Power 10" and "Air 10."
Only Chaor has a better win-loss record in the UnderWorld Colosseum... and Lyssta only has one loss.

name: Lystone
effect: 2MC: Target Creature gains 30 to all Disciplines.

name: Maliph, Guard of the Palace
effect: When Maliph wins combat, relocate Maliph into an unoccupied space adjacent to it.

name: Manual of Vidav
effect: Sacrifice Manual of Vidav: Heal 15 damage to equipped Creature. Play this ability only while equipped Creature is engaged.

name: Maxxor's Torch
effect: Sacrifice Maxxor's Torch: Target opponent chooses a M'arrillian or Minion Creature he or she controls. Maxxor's Torch deals 25 damage to the chosen Creature.

name: Melody of Miracles
effect: If your engaged Creature won a Wisdom Challenge this turn, Melody of Miracles' cost is reduced by 2 Mugic counters.

name: Melody of Mirrored Actions
effect: Destroy target Battlegear equipped to an engaged Creature.
Mugic is a sword that pierces invulnerable armor, a shield that blocks unstoppable strikes.

name: Milla'iin
effect: Discard two Mugic Cards: Destroy target engaged Creature with 0 Power.
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Mind Grind
effect: (To win a Stat Fail, the opposing engaged Creature's Discipline must be less than the stated number.)

name: Mindclasp
effect: When a Mugic or ability controlled by an opponent reduces any of equipped Creature's Disciplines, Mindclasp deals 5 damage to target engaged Creature.

name: Mindful Finish
effect: Stat Fail Courage, Power, Wisdom and Speed 20: Deal 25 damage.

name: Minor Roar
effect: Deal an additional 5 damage for each Mugic counter on your engaged Creature.

name: Mirrors of Misplacement
effect: When a Mugic Card goes to a discard pile, discard an Attack Card, then draw an Attack Card.

name: Mivindal
effect: Sacrifice Mivindal: Return target Mandiblor in your discard pile to play in an unoccupied space on your side of the Battleboard.

name: Mommark's Catapult Tower
effect: When this becomes the active Location, Creatures you control gain "Swift 1."

name: Mount Pillar Reservoir, Neth'uar's Foothold
effect: When this becomes the active Location, each player may return a Chieftain from their discard pile to play in an unoccupied space on their side of the Battleboard.

name: Nauthilax, Tainted
effect: When Nauthilax wins a Power Challenge, it gains an Elemental Type of your choice.
When Nauthilax deals exactly 25 attack damage, destroy target Battlegear.

name: Necrabe
effect: If a Creature would be returned to play from a discard pile, remove it from the game and Necrabe gains 2 Mugic counters instead.

name: Neth'uar
effect: Attacks played by Creatures you control have "Challenge Courage 50: Deal 10 damage."
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Neuro Freeze
effect: If the opposing engaged Creature has Water, the damage dealt by Neuro Freeze is reduced by 10.

name: Nimmei
effect: Hive: Nimmei has an additional 5 Energy and 5 to all Disciplines for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play.
Though young and untested, Nimmei's heart more than makes up for years of experience.

name: Nourishing Nocturne
effect: Sacrifice a Minion Creature. If you do, target engaged Creature gains Energy equal to the Scanned Energy of the sacrificed Creature.
I know you think you gave it your all, but I bet I can coax out a little more.

name: Odd Opus
effect: Target Creature gains 15 Energy and 15 to all Disciplines.
When a mere seven notes can change the course of history, that is the very definition of a miracle.

name: Okaxor
effect: 1MC: Target Creature gains 25 to a Discipline of your choice.

name: Open Doors of the Deepmines
effect: Creatures play their abilities as if each Creature's controller also controlled a Chieftain. (Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)
"Prepare yourselves! This is the nightmare I foretold!"

name: Outsmart
effect: If your Creature's Wisdom is more than opposing engaged Creature's Speed, deal 5 damage. If it isn't, opposing engaged Creature loses 10 Wisdom.

name: Owayki
effect: Mipedians you control with Invisibility have an additional 20 Speed and "Invisibility: Strike 5."
Neither alive nor dead, the ghost of Hunter's Perimeter haunts the haunted.

name: Parasite Tablet
effect: Sacrifice Parasite Tablet: Equipped Creature gains Creature type Mandiblor. Play this ability only while equipped Creature is engaged.

name: Piercing Brilliance
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 50: Opposing engaged Creature loses 15 Wisdom.

name: Plasma Pounder
effect: When equipped Creature deals Earth damage, you may look at the top two cards of your Location Deck. Put one of them on top and the other on the bottom.

name: Plasmarrow
effect: Opposing engaged Creature may not be healed. (Apply this effect only as this card resolves.)

name: Poison Panic
effect: If an Attack Card named Poison Panic is in your Attack Discard pile, reduce Poison Panic's damage by 5.

name: Poison Sphere
effect: Stat Check Speed 50: Opposing engaged Creature loses 15 Speed.

name: Power Punch
effect: If your Creature's Power is more than opposing engaged Creature's Wisdom, deal 5 damage. If it isn't, opposing engaged Creature loses 10 Power.

name: Predator's Song
effect: Sacrifice an unengaged Creature. If you do, target engaged Creature loses X from each Discipline where X is the sacrificed Creature's Scanned Disciplines. If the sacrificed Creature is a Minion, engaged Creatures also lose 10 Energy.

name: Prelude to Dominance
effect: Strike first, strike fast, strike hard, strike last.

name: Prism of Fright
effect: Sacrifice Prism of Fright: Target Creature loses 20 Courage.

name: Prism of Mindlessness
effect: Sacrifice Prism of Mindlessness: Target Creature loses 20 Wisdom.

name: Prism of Sloth
effect: Sacrifice Prism of Sloth: Target Creature loses 20 Speed.

name: Prism of Vacuity
effect: Sacrifice Prism of Vacuity: Target Creature loses 20 Power.

name: Psi-mageddon
effect: Deal 20 damage for each Minion Creature Card in your general discard pile.

name: Psionic Serenade
effect: Remove a Minion Creature Card in your general discard pile from the game. If you do, deal damage to target engaged Creature equal to the removed card's Scanned Energy.

name: Rao'Pa Sahkk, Ihun'kalin's Foothold
effect: When this becomes the active Location, each player sacrifices a Battlegear.
When a M'arrillian or Minion Creature wins a Challenge on an Attack it plays, that Creature gains 5 Energy.

name: Rath'tab
effect: Discard a Mugic Card: Remove all Mugic counters on target engaged Creature.
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Reefshard
effect: While any player controls a Chieftain, equipped Creature has an additional 10 to all Disciplines.

name: Rhythms of Rage
effect: Target Mandiblor gains "Outperform Courage 5." If it is Infected, it gains "Earth 5." If Hive is active, it also gains 15 Energy.

name: Ritzu'dag
effect: At the beginning of combat, your engaged Creature gains 50 to its lowest Discipline. (If two or more Disciplines are tied for lowest, choose one.)
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Riverlands, Erak'tabb's Foothold
effect: When this becomes the active Location, each player removes a Mugic counter from a Creature they control.
Attacks deal 5 less damage to M'arrillian and Minion Creatures.

name: Savell
effect: Reduce Recklessness damage dealt to Warbeasts you control by 10 for each Mugic counter on Savell.

name: Screeching Scare
effect: If your Creature's Courage is more than opposing engaged Creature's Power, deal 5 damage. If it isn't, opposing engaged Creature loses 10 Courage.

name: Selective Strain
effect: Target Creature gains 25 to a Discipline of your choice. That Creature loses 25 to another Discipline of your choice.
Every up has a down, every left has a right. The Cothica is always in balance.

name: Sinister Statuette
effect: When equipped Creature deals 15 or more attack damage, opposing engaged Creature loses 10 in a Discipline of your choice.

name: Sink Scream
effect: Fire: Reduce opposing engaged Creature's Power to 0.
Air: Reduce opposing engaged Creature's Speed to 0.
Earth: Reduce opposing engaged Creature's Courage to 0.
Water: Reduce opposing engaged Creature's Wisdom to 0.

name: Snare Attack
effect: If your Creature's Speed is more than opposing engaged Creature's Courage, deal 5 damage. If it isn't, opposing engaged Creature loses 10 Speed.

name: Song of Stable Shields
effect: Target Creature's Disciplines cannot be increased or decreased by Mugic or abilities.
If every counter has a counter, what can we count on?

name: Specific Diminishing
effect: Target Creature loses 20 to a Discipline of your choice.

name: Stormgrounds
effect: Minion Creatures' activated abilities cost an additional Mugic counter to play.
The lightning storm has raged for hundreds of years... and will continue to do so long after every creature is gone.

name: Surprising Riffs
effect: Unfortunately for Gronmar, his Telebracers sputtered and died seconds before the toxic tidal wave struck him full force.

name: Symphony of Similarity
effect: Target Creature gains 5 to all Disciplines for each Mandiblor you control.

name: Tangath Toborn, In Training
effect: 1MC: Tangath Toborn gains or loses Courage, Power, Wisdom and Speed to make its Disciplines equal to its Scanned Disciplines.

name: Targubaj
effect: 1MC: Heal 10 damage to target engaged Creature.

name: Tartarek, Psi Overloader
effect: Discard an OverWorld Mugic Card: Destroy target Chieftain with 100 or more Wisdom.

name: Terror-fying Tackle
effect: (To win a Stat Fail, the opposing engaged Creature's Discipline must be less than the stated number.)

name: The Heart of the Jungle
effect: If a Mugic or ability would increase or decrease the Disciplines of one engaged Creature, it increases or decreases the Disciplines of both engaged Creatures instead.
Mirage: Creatures in this space have an additional 10 to all Disciplines.

name: The Hive Gallery
effect: Damage dealt by Power Attacks is reduced by 5.
As long as we never forget the fallen, they will live forever.

name: The Infectorium
effect: At the beginning of combat, deal 15 damage to Infected engaged non-Danian Creatures.
As the breeding ground of millions of parasites, Danians can infect every creature in Perim a hundred times over.

name: The OverWorld Library
effect: Damage dealt by Courage Attacks is reduced by 5.
From cookbooks to Cothica clues, every book written is within.

name: The Pit Token
effect: Sacrifice The Pit Token: Deal 10 damage to target engaged Creature. Play this ability only while equipped Creature is engaged.

name: The Pits
effect: Damage dealt by Speed Attacks is reduced by 5.
The UnderWorlders are fair - all are guilty until proven innocent.

name: Tomugar
effect: 1MC: Target Creature gains 25 to a Discipline and loses 10 to another.

name: Tonal Destruction
effect: Your opponent reveals X Mugic Cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. Your opponent discards the chosen card.
If you eliminate the cause, you'll never face the consequences.

name: Ulmar's Bionic Steam Arms
effect: Equipped Creature deals an additional 5 damage with attacks.
If equipped Creature deals more than 20 damage with a single attack, sacrifice Ulmar's Bionic Steam Arms and deal 20 damage to the equipped Creature.

name: Ulmar's Projection Cavern
effect: When Ulmar's Projection Cavern becomes the active Location, your opponent reveals a new active Location.
Mirage: At the beginning of each player's turn, if this space is unoccupied, that player may relocate one of their Creatures to this space.

name: Ulmar's Projector
effect: If equipped Creature is destroyed while engaged, return it to play in an open space on your side of the Battleboard with no Mugic counters.

name: Ulmquad
effect: 1MC: Deal 10 damage to target Creature and Ulmquad gains 10 Energy.

name: Van Bloot's Banquet
effect: M'arrillian and Minion Creatures have an additional 5 Energy.
When your engaged Creature loses Initiative, it gains 20 to all Disciplines.
A toast to my new friends! Together, we'll overthrow Chaor!

name: Vidav's Refectorium
effect: When this becomes the active Location, each player draws two Attack Cards, then discards two Attack Cards.
Though Vidav wants peace, his battle tactics are undeniably the best.

name: Web Cocoon
effect: Stat Check Power 50: Your engaged Creature gains Fire.

name: Whirling Wail
effect: Your opponent may not play Mugic Cards. (Apply this effect only as this card resolves.)

name: Wistanne
effect: 1MC: Heal 10 damage to target Creature and it loses 25 Speed.

name: Wrenges
effect: 1MC: Heal 15 damage to target engaged Creature.

name: Xis'torq
effect: Creatures you control have "Elementproof all Elemental Types 10."
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)
